description: The building is a set of four flats. Ours is Flat A in the basement. It has a unique interior and a long narrow garden.

factsheet.heading: Interior and Gardens on a budget
paragraphs: As seen in House & Garden magazine. Our flat is a great example of renovating a space inside and out on a tight budget. How to get creative and inventive with making a unique and beautiful space.

images.title: Photo by Mark Anthony Fox in House & Garden

travel_info: Additional travel info: 2 minute walk from Rectory Road station

name: 137A Evering Road
